DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of this study is the evaluation of QoL, tolerability and use of Zoladex 10,8 SafeSystem for advanced PCa under naturalistic conditions
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of QoL, Tolerability and Use of Zoladex 10,8 SafeSystem for Advanced PCa - German IPEP Trial
DOC.criteria: Patients with PCa, who will be treated with Zoladex 10,8 SafeSystem based on the current SPC
